content.detailedDescription: Stepped outside to smoke a cigarette, looked up and noticed a bright flickering flame in the shape of what i thought was a parachute.  it looked like it was falling to the ground within 50 yards of my location (thinking it was one of those fourth of july parachute things that caught on fire) i stepped towards it to retrieve it from my neighbors yard.  at that moment i noticed it changed direction slightly and was moving differently than something falling to the ground.  as i observed it further it became smaller and looked as though it was gaining altitude now.  i observed it further and noticed an aircraft at normal traveling height maybe 30k feet, could see its lights as it was dark.  the object was traveling opposite its direction and below it's altitude and continued to become smaller, it was not falling off the horizon like an aircraft as it traveled southward but was becoming smaller.  i watched it further until it became to small to observe.
content.summary: Erratic traveling flame

content.detailedDescription: I looked up to the sky as me and my friend were walking west towards the store and noticed two bright lights that resembled street lights glowing in the sky. i thought to myself that's weird for a plane to have orange lights because that's the fashion in which there were moving towards us then just as i said that they started to get brighter and looked as if they were falling towards us. a few seconds of them falling they suddenly stopped in mid air and froze the left one dipped down a few feet and then the right one dipped down in a clock like motion and went directly up quickly dimming and then vanishing. seemingly seconds after but almost at the same time the one on the left dipped down and did the same thing. neither of them made any sound and left us wondering what they where. i had looked online and found similar accounts of the same sightings that had been published in the paper a few years earlier over the same hills but have never had any answers. i was watching a show and they mentioned this site hence my statement i'm giving now in hopes of some explaination to what we witnessed that night. thanks
content.summary: Airplane like then changed direction hovered then  accelerated till vanished

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were going to dinner around 5:30pm. we noticed that the sky was filled with con-trails that crisscrossed the sky everywhere. it looked so odd that i decided to get out my phone and take a picture of it. i took 8 pictures and did not look at the pictures until we got to the restaurant and couldn't believe what we saw. there were at least 8 different sets of lights. two of them looked like they could be triangular. we were excited to see that we had gotten these sighting on our phone.
content.summary: Didn't see it until we looked at our picutres of all the contrails in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Me and my family were watching the knicks game when at the halftime show this light flew direcrly up in a vertical motion. let me no what you think, thank you
content.summary: Something moving faster then any aerial air craft i've ever.Seen

content.detailedDescription: I left my place of business with my 2 daughters walking towards our house at approximately 8:10pm. it was dark out, no clouds in the sky, i looked up and seen 5 glowing red circular lights moving in a rectangular formation. each object was pulsating red. they were moving from the southwest to the northwest of my location. suddenly a 6th craft came up behind the other five to join them. i then noticed a jet airliner coming up behind them, which had left the edmonton international airport, and they suddenly went out of formation into a single file, and streaked of to the north, out of sight. they made no noise, whereas the jet airliner could be heard.
content.summary: 6 red pulsating lights in sky moving in formation, then changing to single file over city of edmonton, alberta.

content.detailedDescription: I was bewildered. i have looked and gazed at the mountains many times. i've looked at them at this exact time, and never noticed any stars or planets in that area before. grant you i was in my bathroom and looking through a screened open window, but this was no ordinary light. it has a "mist" like quality, and hovered very low towards the canyon of the mountains. i have to say, that i was almost in a trance like state while looking at it. my mind didn't know what i was seeing. i couldn't pull myself away from the window. i turned off by bathroom light, and just stared, not fully able to comprehend what i was seeing. it was just a very large misty glowing orb. if i had to describe it best, i'd sat that it looked like a moon hidden behind clouds? except it wasn't the moon, the moon was to the east, and this was to the west. it was too low to be a star, or planet. i finally was able to call my boyfriend into the bathroom, and he saw it too. he was as affected by the light, so he kind of snapped me out of it. i decided i needed to go outside and take a photo, or a video. when i got outside to my backyard, the light was not there. it had vanished. i spend the next two hours so confused. i still don't know what it is i saw hovering over the la quinta cove.
content.summary: I looked out of my bathroom window at the mountain, and saw a strange light that i have never seen before near the mountains near my home.

content.detailedDescription: We were in texas, outside of fredricksburg, in the hill area. i do not remember what road we were on since we were on motorcycles and enjoying the roads. we did not notice any lights in the sky. it was only when we were home and downloading the pictures we took that we saw the  lights at the top of the photo. i am just wondering what your take is on the picture and if you think it's just a reflection or aircraft etc.
content.summary: Did not notice these lights at the time the picture was taken.

content.detailedDescription: Walking dog looking up in night sky noticed one star moving through sky, then noticed several others moving at same speed making a perfect triangle, took pictures and video.
content.summary: Lights moving through night sky in shape of triangle

content.detailedDescription:
Our family group, consisting of approx 23 members, had travelled to portugal for my nephew's wedding and reception, in porto.
after the wedding, the bride and groom, stayed behind in porto, along with a few members of the family. the remaining group travelled to sao felix hotel (located at mt.Sao felix - around 40km from porto) for a bit of rest and recreation.

 during the night of 6th september at approximately 23:40 nine younger members of our family (ranging from ages 21 to 36) witnessed an array of several hundred bright sparkly lights, which travelled in formation directly above them, and beyond towards the coast, and then upwards to fade out of sight.

the objects appeared to move as one, and "gave them a good, happy sensation" rather than one of fear. the sighting lasted not more than a few minutes.
my nephew then ran three storeys up, to usher the parents of the groups to go into the viewing gallery of the hotel, to try and witness the event themselves,
but by that time, the objects had disappeared. i have some pictures taken by my nephew, in porto, and also a video/audio of the sighting in sao felix. unfortunately, the video is of poor quality, but you can hear from the voices of the observers, that something strange had been witnessed.

the group of cousins contacted the groom, who was honeymooning in porto at the time, to inform him of the sighting, but were shocked and duly surprised to hear that he too, along with his new wife, and other family members had witnessed the same thing, and had taken photographs of the objects. the two groups were separated by around 40km.....!!!
content.summary: Sighting of several hundred (upto 1000) bright lights, witnessed by 2 groups of a family, in porto and sao felix at same time.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home west bound on west hills road,in south huntington, new york, and i stopped at a stop sign, and ahead of me to my left in the 10:00 o'clock position was a triangular shaped craft with three bright white lights, heading west. it continued to move forward at a steady pace, but not fast, about 500 feet ahead of me, and as i continued forward, it continued forward, until the road turned north, and i couldn't see the object any longer. i kept looking to my left to see if the craft turned north, but i didn't see anything. the craft was black and had smooth corners, with two lights on the bottom and one on the top. the white lights were extremely bright, but did not pulse. it was about 20-30 feet across, and 15-20 feet tall. i wondered if it was an aircraft, but there were no flashing red or blue lights, or wings. it was flying too low to be a plane, and i've never seen any planes fly in that east-to-west pattern over west hills road. the flight patterns to republic airport(which is fairly close by) are north-to-south, and i see the small planes or small jets fly by my house in a north-to-south pattern on a regular basis. the craft was flying just west of route 110, which is one of the most very heavily trafficked north-to-south routes on long island. even though it was a saturday night, i noticed that there was a lot of traffic on route 110. i don't know if the craft flew over route 110, or if anyone else noticed it. there was no one else on west hills road in either direction except myself. the craft was also was flying to the vicinity of jayne's hill, which is the highest peak on long island, and it is also in west hills park, which is a large, heavily wooded area. i wondered if i had really seen the craft, since i don't have any point of reference in my life to compare the sighting to. i am totally amazed at what i saw, and won't forget it.
content.summary: I saw a triangular shaped craft with bright white lights

content.detailedDescription:
9:53pm 17/1/2016 
i was walking with someone in milang,south australia, when i looked up at the sky and noticed a star moving. i had originally thought it to be a plane, but there was no sound and the light was not blinking. it was the color of a normal star but had been moving at the speed of a centimetre or two a second (if you were to stick your hand completely out and compare with your finger's width). after it moved around five(5) centimetres it stopped, changed direction slightly (15 degrees south from it's original east direction compared to the horizon), and did this once more before turning 45 degrees north ward and its light faded away to nothing within seven seconds.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Appeared to be a star before moving slowly (seemed to be 1-2cm/second across sky) for six minute, started fading and within ~7 seconds had disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was a kid it was 15 pm i was on the way to my grandma wihte my parents in our car  i looked out of the window in the sky then i saw a violet comet like objekt i told my parents my stepfather stopet the car and both got out they sayd to me to stay put in the car they saw the objet then i dont know why but it was like houres has passed in a blink of an eye it was dark my parents got bake in the car for them was everything normal the objekt was nowere for me it was like i have sleept i though it was a dream i was confused and my head hurt and then we drove to my grandma
content.summary: It was in the winter 96

content.detailedDescription: Randomly saw this object while driving. pulled over and just watched it, took a video, and a photo with cell phone. attempted to drive closer to it but got lost then returned to the original site and it was still there. spent a total of 30 minutes watching it before i had to leave.
content.summary: Cigar shaped ufo, totally silent, hovering

content.detailedDescription:
I was leading a tour in nikko japan.  after dinner at a local restaurant, me and another guy walked back to the hotel at around 10pm.  

the other guy was an astronomer so we were looking at the night sky and talking about the stars that were easy to see high up in the mountains.

i saw what looked like a satellite moving in space.  i usually can see satellites that looked like this slow moving white lighted object.  i mentioned to the other guy to look at it.

it then came at a very high rate of speed out of space toward out location. it got bigger and you see see a triangle outline with a light on each tip of the triangle shape.

it was completely silent.

it then stopped and hovered right over us for 5 seconds then pivoted to the left and slowly moved until it was out of site past the next mountain top.

the guy was walking with freaked out and ran when it pivoted to the left silently. 

the whole time it never made a sound and was about the size of a football field.  i could tell the size because it was very low and you could compare against the trees and mountains.

it worthy to note that it was the same night obama came to japan.
content.summary: Triangle ufo over nikko, japan

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 6:55 am on january 16, 2016, i was walking my dog.  our house is essentially directly below the flight path for planes landing at honolulu international airport and i always look at every plane just to see which airline it is.  i saw a plane approaching from the west (i was also facing west) at an unknown altitude, looked up and saw that it was a japan airlines plane and kept walking.  my dog stopped to sniff the grass and i turned around (now looking east) to look at the plane again.  my attention immediately went to a seemingly normal nimbus-type of cloud that was at a higher altitude than the plane.  as i looked at the cloud, i saw a perfectly straight line being traced/cut through the cloud as of something was flying through it but there was absolutely nothing there.  i wasn't sure what just happened so i just kept staring at the cloud and roughly 15-20 seconds later, the cloud had continued its normal movement and the perfectly straight line was gone.  at no point was there a visible craft or object but there was an unmistakable, perfectly straight line being made through the middle of the cloud.  it was like a vapor trail in reverse.  i have no meteorological knowledge and as such i have no idea if this is something that just happens on its own.
content.summary: Something created a perfectly straight line through a cloud but there was no visible craft

content.detailedDescription: I was by the pool relaxing and had my eyes closed for a few minutes, but i felt the need to open my eyes and look to my top left to the sky. at first i thought i had some dots in my contacts or something affecting my vision from having my eyes closed earlier. but as i blinked it didn't go away. first thought was like are those balloons? and at first the 2 objects were not that far from me so that's why i thought the balloons are raising into the air. but then i knew there were not balloons as they had the same distance from each other and going in the same direction. beautifully parrellel. there was no specific sound, calmness really. the 2 objects kept moving ne but higher to the sky from the initial point i saw them. as soon as i realized this may be something, i started to taking a video and pictures with my phone. however, my video stopped recording after some seconds so i tried another video and it only did a few seconds so i just kept trying to take picture and zoom it as much possible to get a better view. it latest a few minutes. i actually called my mom to tell her and she said she was close so i was telling her i will go to her to show her and my dad. however, our connection failed. so i recalled and said i am coming but as soon as i said that i saw the 2 objects slightly move to the left and disappeared instantly. i wanted to share my experience with others because i am certain this was a unique ufo experience. i also felt an itch on my left and i saw like a line which i took a picture of. the redness lasted at least 30 minutes and don't have it anymore.
content.summary: Sitting outside and felt drawn to look and saw 2 moving circular objects and it wasn't balloons

content.detailedDescription:
No idea what it is.  never took a picture with that in the frame.  i photograph cloud colors and cloud formations.
it's not dust or lint because that is the only photo that l have with that strange object in the left side of the frame.
content.summary: Discovered when uploading to my computer

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from my sister-in,law's house. in the distance west, i thought i saw two planets near the horizon. as i kept driving, i realized they couldn't be planets, because they were getting bigger and brighter.Then i thought they  might be planes. there is a flight path far to the south that is visible from the road. eventually, they got close enough to see they weren't planes either.  they flew very close to the road, almost tree-top level. i was crossing a bridge when they were closest. the first passed on my left, about. 100 ft away. the second passed a few seconds later on my right,  about 300 ft away. they were equilateral triangles, glowing white. the corners were rounded, and the edges were bevelled. there was a red dome light in the center. i could see shadows in the dome. i slowed down to an idle,rolled down my window and listened for a sound: they were absolutely silent. my husband and son werte also in the car, but they were asleep. i couldn't wake them up. i don't know what they were, but i got a very good look at them. they were 50 ft on each side. i had a passing thought that they might be going to wright patterson afb.
content.summary: Saw 2 large triangles flying w to e along highway 50.

content.detailedDescription: Sighting
content.summary: Sighting at great salt lake

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my family seated suddenly something bright that turned night into broad daylight moved on top off us like if it were a shooting star within a period of 2 to 3 seconds...Mom went into the house to tell dad but dad never minded about it..I was only about 9 years old..But we just believed it was a shooting star that comes out every fifty years and maybe fell into the desert which is not possible ... now that i am grown up...So now i like to believe that maybe it was an asteriod that had hit the atmosphere of the earth but still it was close...Again one day during day time i climbed on top of a tall tree that had branches cut off ...I was on the heighest peak of the tree suddenly a fast thing like eagle shaped but grey in color and maybe about 50 meters long moved above me and dissapeared in front of me transit time about 3 seconds again..I could not believe what had happened but i know what had happened but i didn't tell any one about it...I had crazy thoughts...In 2009 i was in a different city far away from my hometown in boardind school...It was at night when i was coming from the deputy head house from buying food suddenly as i was about to leave the yard tiny dots of yellow lights appeared in front of me forming a tiny disc like the size of two basketballs put together about 15 steps away from me suddenly went on ...When it went on i heard i small sound like  *teen*  and suddenly went of again ..Making me to be freaked out ...I was confused knowing what i saw..I was confused whether to believe that aliens exist or not but i knew what i saw was real i just kept quiet about it...Sometimes when i am sleeping i feel like if i am paralysed ...Struggling hard just to wake up..Trying by all means trying to move my hands and open my eyes but i believe the paralyse part has nothing to do with alien abduction
content.summary: I was outside with my extented family mom was there...Night turned into broad day light..

content.detailedDescription:
This has occurred 3 times within the last year driving new york's taconic parkway just north of the croton reservoir bridge.  most recent sightings was about 11:30 pm new years eve, dec. 31, 2015.  i was driving south on the taconic and noticed the same type and style of ufo i had observed about six months ago in the same general location.  this time i tried to pull over so i could watch the ufo, but by the time i was able to pull over it had moved north east.  the shape of the craft was a triangle shape of dark gray; non reflective material.  a very bright light was on the point end of the craft with blinking or pulsing red and green lights on the triangular sides of the object.  i noticed it hovering then moving very slowly.  
i was surprised the first time i saw this object, but this time i knew what it was and just wanted to get a better look at it.  

my next sighting was january 2, 2016 approximately 5 pm.  i was traveling north on the taconic parkway just north of the croton reservoir bridge.  (that area does not have many trees which would impede the viewing of a craft). i noticed very, very high in the sky a bright white light and was trying to figure out what it was.  the light and object got lower and i could see that it was the same type of ufo craft with pulsing green and red lights as i had seen two days before.  i was a little surprised to see this object when it was so early in the day.  the object slowly moved south east in its trajectory.  

i never felt afraid when i viewed the ufo's just an initial surprise as i never thought i would see one.
content.summary: Ufo appeared from the southeast and moved slowly toward the ne.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were parked facing the ocean at ocean beach in san francisco ca at around 11:30 p.M. we both noticed a glowing craft that appeared to be an extremely bright star at first hovering in front and slightly to the right of us.Suddenly it changed its position completely going to the left and lower so that it was more directly in front of us. it hovered again in the exact place for 5-10 min then quickly changed its altitude and positioning in relation to where we could see it from inside the car. it moved extremely quickly and was able to stay in the exact spot. then suddenly it dissappeared. it was an extremely clear night with no clouds. from what i could tell it remained over the ocean the whole time. it was bigger than what a star appears to be and had it had blinking lights i would've mistook it for a plane while it was stationary.
content.summary: While parked at the beach witnessed a bright light hover and change directions/altitudes

content.detailedDescription: On january 3rd 2016 i was travelling on a ferry from vancouver bc to the town of gibsons. while onboard i took 5 photos of the sunset on my phone. the next day as i was looking through them i noticed a green object in 4 of the 5 that i hadn't seen or heard when taking the photos. the time on the first 3 photos is 4:02pm and the next two were taken at 4:03. the details on my phone don't tell me what the seconds are but the 5 photos were taken in under 2 mins.
content.summary: When looking through the photos on my phone from a recent vacation, i noticed a green object in some of them.

content.detailedDescription: 2 ufos hovering low, they seemed cloak one another.
content.summary: Very bright

content.detailedDescription: Just got home around 10:30 p.M, january 15, 2016. was starting to unload groceries from the car. looked up and seen object slowly hovering and coming from the east, then changed direction as it hovered and then went on it's path. in traveled in the northeast direction. it pulsated just a little as it was moving and then faded out.
content.summary: Reddish-orange object

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog misty. i always watch the
the night sky here the stars are so bright here
i noticed this one star to the north west it was

twinkleing like crazy very odd. like a strobe light. i said that's a weird star misty. just then
from my right field of vison i noticed a small 
a solid disk against the whiteness of the snow covered ountains. it took off so fast it made a streak of light colors orange. red. from right to lef.T i
content.summary: Saw a ufo take off it was going so fast it made a streak of light.

content.detailedDescription: At 831pm central time a single bright yellow sphere was observed over cresson, texas, at an estimated altitude of 500 feet and in the direction of the moon. the object was almost stationary, possibly drifting slightly southwest. it glowed for 2 minutes, then dimmed quickly and went dark. seconds later a triangular formation of 3 identical spheres, also bright yellow, appeared in the same location and remained stationary for 5 minutes, never changing in appearance. all 3 dimmed simultaneously and went dark. seconds later another single sphere appeared in the same location and was once again bright yellow, glowing for about 2 minutes, then dimming and going dark. the entire sequence lasted between 10 and 15 minutes. when a photo was taken of the formation of 3 the moon could been seen clearly in each photo, but the objects were not visible at all in any of the photos. the sky was mostly clear with scattered high stratus clouds. no sounds were heard. a report was made with the hood county sheriff's office. a deputy came to confirm our sighting and told us he had received a total of 5 reports from around the local area.
content.summary: 3 distinct sightings of a total of 5 identical stationary objects that glowed, then went dark

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i had just got home from the coast and she was getting ready to go out to the movies with her sister,  i went outside to call my dad to say hi and have a chat like i do every week,  i was walking around out the back of our unit complex in curtin act, it was around 19:30hrs when it was dark and there were storms around the canberra area.  i looked up to watch the lightning going off in the distance when i noticed a plane going across the storm clouds heading south west / westerly.  what really caught my eye was the bright light flying behind the aircraft, it was zig zagging in quick sharp movements back and forward about 100m of the back of the aircraft. i watched for about a minute in awe then finished on the phone to my dad, mesmerized by the sighting i realized i should get my wife i ran to the window and got he attention and told her to come out and look at this, when i turned to look back at the aircraft and the bright light the light stopped for a second and then shot off into the storm clouds. unfortunately my wife didn't get outside in time to see it.

when i first saw the light behind the aircraft i thought it may have been another aircrafts front light until all of the zig zagging then i realized this was some sort of craft that we do not have the technology for.

i was amazed and felt so excited because i have always been interested in ufo's and any unusual phenomena.  in my life i have seen many things i cant explain including ghosts and other ufo phenomena which i would love to share.
content.summary: Bright white light zig zagging aroung behind local passenger aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking around my area looking for the snow owls the that flew over my head in my backyard i heard them howling and echoing throughout the neighborhood i was amazed to even see them in person so i decided to pull out my camera to try get glimpse of the owls after 15 minutes of walking i never did find them but heard them on the roofs so i tried to put night vision on my camera to see if could get better picture that way but the snow was reflecting the street lights with an orange type light towards the lens as i started to look at the roofs and seen cloud moving that almost looked like a bubble and it was the only one moving so i watched until i seen a giant flying object that was so close to the ground with triangle shape with lights on 3 corners of the triangle and an arrow shape light on the front sides of the triangle flying object with a big circle in the middle that pulsed  red and flickered a  white light at the back side of the triangle i did not get good shot with my camera what made me upset about it i should of just kept my camera on its normal setting but i was panicking to get it on camera before disappeared i really really want to try get it on camera again but after getting it on camera i put it in my pocket without knowing it was still on i start walking towards home in the middle of the street and i hear the same noise the ufo was making through the sky and snow above the clouds maybe there was more so i pointed my camera up hoping to get another one but nothing came to the plate. i lost site by clouds and snow
at the time i was looking for snow owls.
i thought for sure it was a ufo.
it flew out the clouds below it coming from north west and flew east above me. i felt exited i felt like i wanted to try signal them haha so i started to try film with the night vision witch was no help with snow and light reflections i felt like i could of got better shot.
flew out of site into the snow and dusk.
content.summary: I was walking out side looking for the snow owls that flew over my head in my backyard with my camera in hand

content.detailedDescription: I was driving southbound on m1. approaching junction 21. there was traffic on the road and travelling approx 20 mph. i noticed in my view up to the left through my front windscreen an unusual white, short sharp trail perhaps 5mm in length it looked but was well over a mile away in the sky looking towards the south east region. it started as very small white trail with a 45 degree angle. then the trail seem to change direction going vertical. at this point i felt that an object was causing this trail as the trail took a upside down very shape appearance.  which looked like it was caused by drag against whatever this object was. all i could see was the trail though and not an object. i felt this was very unusual. it then appeared to change direction again by which it looked like it was going back to the left of my view in the sky (almost like back on itself)which i have never seen before and still at this point i could not view an object just the trail which again had changed shape and drag looked like it was from left to right. because i wasnt able to undresrand what it was using logic i thought best to try and take picture. i took several pictures on the hope that with my camera on maximum focus i would capture some detail. reviewing the pictures i managed to capture something quite remarkable and i wanted to show it you today. you will have to zoom in the photo. it appears in the moment i have captured the actual object which has caused the the trail which i initially viewed. when you zoom in on the object it appears that it's somewhat of a transparent star shaped object which is slightly curved too. i have attached the image for you to view. my phone has recorded the exact location i was in too.
content.summary: Started as very small white trail with 45 degree angle. then trail very shaped and depicted object to be going vertical. then appeared that object then comes back on itself. i managed to take picture at this point. i then lost sight of object after this
